subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: LaShawn Merritt stormed through the 400 meters and grabbed a commanding victory, but the men’s and women’s 4x100 relay teams both dropped the baton and failed to advance.
snippet: LaShawn Merritt stormed through the 400 meters and grabbed a commanding victory, but the men’s and women’s 4x100 relay teams both dropped the baton and failed to advance.
